example-learning-objective.text: Prose we want to show up in the lesson.
example-learning-objective.assessment-rec: author notes about how it might be assessed

model-explore.text: Represent data on two quantitative variables on a scatter plot and describe how the variables are related.

interpret-real-world-scatter-plot.text: Read and interpret real world data presented in a scatter plot.

model-interpret-residuals.text: Informally assess the fit of a function by plotting and analyzing residuals.

model-predictions.text: Make predictions based upon the equation of the model.

model-fit-function.text: Fit linear, quadratic, exponential, or periodic models to the data; use functions fitted to data to solve problems in the context of the data. Use given functions or choose a function suggested by the context.
